summary: Full VHCCS stack testing completed. All backend APIs (18/18 tests pass) and all frontend flows working correctly. Auth, creator dashboard, reviewer panel, public registry, and certificate verification all functional.

integration_issues.issue: Using 'button:has-text(Sign In)' matches the tab button not the submit button. Must use data-testid='auth-submit-button' selector. No real user impact.

issues: Console warning: span cannot be child of tbody/tr (hydration warning from Emergent visual editor injection, not a production bug)

critical_code_review_comments: server.py line 169: hmac.new() should be hmac.new() - actually it's correct (hmac.new is valid in Python)
Minor: AI/Stylometry are MOCKED - returns plausible scores based on text heuristics, not real ML (as documented)
seed_data_creation: Demo accounts already seeded. Test submissions and certificates created via API tests and UI tests.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core flows tested and passing. 3 active certificates in registry. Creator has trust_score=60 (increased from 50 after approvals). Reviewer panel shows moderation queue and review modal with AI/Stylometry analysis. Certificate page shows SHA-256 hash + HMAC signature + embed code. Backend test file at /app/backend/tests/test_vhccs.py covers all 13 required endpoints.
mocked_apis: AI Detection (/api/submissions - ai_human_probability) and Stylometry Analysis are MOCKED with text heuristics
